page.title: 08A CHURCH IN CROSSGATES
page.content: Our church is{Saint Theresa's Roman {Catholic Church.}It was built in 1953, Bishop Heenan laid the foundation stone.There are{three priests, Canon {Tangney, Father Driver and Father {Clarke.}Mass is celebrated every day. on most days there is a{morning and {evening mass,}on Sunday there are four masses. It is possible to fulfill the obligation of hearing Sunday mass by attending Saturday evening. Boys from Saint Theresa's Primary School serve as{altar boys}for church services, and may continue to do so after they have left the school.{Other services include weddings, baptisms, the reception of the sacraments of reconciliation, Eucharist, confirmation and funerals. At the side of the church is a meeting room where parents can take noisy babies and still partake in ceremonies.
